body:
Hi Marta ,



It´s not an error , no light source- is for the interior lights , so unless you´re not running artificial lighting similation is not a problem,  please refer to :

 [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/hobeybee-ho...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/hobeybee-hourly-solar-radiation?xg_source=activity)
